DOC.brief_summary: To determine efficacy preoperative IV dexamethasone postoperative pain control TKA .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Preoperative Intravenous Dexamethasone Primary Total Knee Arthroplasty
DOC.detailed_description: Preoperative intravenous 0.1 mg/kg dexamethasone could reduce pain primary TKA .
DOC.criteria: Osteoarthritis knee undergo unilateral primary total knee arthroplasty 5085 year old ASA class 13 Unable perform spinal anaesthesia History drug allergy : steroid Renal impairment ( CrCl < 30 mL/min ) Liver impairment Cognitive function disorder Poor control DM ( HA1C > 7.5 ) Morning DTX operative day > 180 mg % Received corticosteroid within 3 month surgery
